name: Tea Quest: Royal Tea's Revenge
description:
Janice faces off against Lord Steepington!

He's out for revenge ... you're there for tea!

Experience a humorous and challenging platform adventure. Test your skill against devious Kettles, secretive saucers and more!

Make your way through Steepington's Castle. Jump, run, and think your way past his dastardly minions.

A Legion of enemies await, each with a deadly specialty.

Search for secrets to help you on your journey, but beware - danger lurks at every turn!

Featuring
  • A Whimsical hand-drawn storybook art style
  • A diverse cast of dastardly enemies
  • Numerous secret areas to find
  • Coins to collect!
